header.description: Property.  This message contains the definition of a position constraint.

link_name.description: Property.  The robot link this constraint refers to

target_point_offset.description: Property.  The offset (in the link frame) for the target point on the link we are planning for

constraint_region.description: Property.  The volume this constraint refers to

weight.description: Property.  A weighting factor for this constraint (denotes relative importance to other constraints. Closer to zero means less important)
